on reading compounds: 走行【ソウコウ】running a wheeled vehicle (e.g. car), running to program, job, etc., traveling, travelling
快走【カイソウ】fast moving, fast running, fast sailing
kun reading compounds: 走る【はしる】to run, to travel (movement of vehicles), to drive, to flow (e.g. energy), to hurry to, to retreat (from battle), to take flight, to run away from home, to elope, to tend heavily toward, to flash, to streak, to shoot through (e.g. pain)
